tool_description: Twitter API with auth. You can use all user functions. Tweet, Fav, DM, RT, Bookmark etc.  Contact me if you have a problem.
name: Twitter Auth API | All Functions Available.
title: Twitter Auth API | All Functions Available.
tool_name: Twitter Auth API | All Functions Available.

api_list.name: Unfavorite Tweet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-auth-api-all-functions-available.p.rapidapi.com/unfavorite_tweet"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-auth-api-all-functions-available.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://twitter-auth-api-all-functions-available.p.rapidapi.com/unfavorite_tweet"
